divs: sighting detailsi was driving up the hill towards my home when i noticed a large orang\red orb hovering over a house....i thought to myself.what the hell is that...i found myself stopping my car in the middle of the road...got out of my car and it started to ascend, at which point i was saying out load what the f--- is that! several times. it then stopped, at which point i thought to get my cell phone and try and capture pictures of what i was witnessing...which i did...at this point it stopped and changed paths 2 times within seconds it was super high up and significantly smaller....2 dots of light fell from the first orb then they dissappeared. when i got home a few minutes later i called my sister and other family members ...i was completely freaked out by this experience... when i looked at the pictures i captured they looked nothing like what i witnessed with my naked eye..i did capture it and you can see the distance within seconds it traveled..from very large, hovering over a house to appearing to be a star. also , in the pics you can see smoke in odd shapes that i did not notice with my eyes..i remember thinking why isnt any one comin out of there homes wondering what the hell i'm doing so i can show them.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
